personal.coverLetter:
I am a senior software engineer with 8+ years of experience designing and building highly scalable systems, cloud-native applications, and developer-friendly tools. My work spans frontend, backend, and DevOps, with a strong focus on developer experience, performance optimization, and system design.

I love contributing to open-source, mentoring developers, and building products that improve productivity and accessibility. I value clarity, collaboration, and craftsmanship in software engineering.

I am currently seeking opportunities where I can drive technical strategy, lead projects, and contribute to impactful user-centered products.
